translations.chinese: 人問嫗何哭，嫗曰：「人殺吾子。」
translations.english: People asked the old woman why she was crying. The old woman said: "Someone killed my son."
People said: "Why was your son killed?"

translations.chinese: 嫗曰：「吾子，白帝子也，化為蛇，當道，今者赤帝子斬 之，故哭。」
translations.english: The old woman said: "My son was the son of the White Emperor. He transformed into a snake and blocked the road. Just now, the son of the Red Emperor cut him down. That's why I'm crying."

translations.chinese: 人乃以嫗為不誠，欲苦之，嫗因忽不見。
translations.english: People then thought the old woman was not telling the truth and wanted to torment her, but the old woman suddenly disappeared.
Later people arrived, and Emperor Gaozu woke up.
